content: click here for free pattern tutorial ** cat pouch with lanyard tutorial 1 ** click here to purchase our printable pdf pattern ** cat pouch with lanyard - crochet pattern pdf 2 ** we re crafting something practical and adorable its a kitty cat cardholder with a long lanyard strap if you re a beginner searching for an easy pattern a fan of crochet bags and pouches or simply like me love cats this tutorial is perfect for you what do you think of this cat cardholder it is just the right size for your cards its so super adorable with its plump tail and sleepy eyes and holding that little fish you can crochet a long strap to go around your neck or a shorter strap so it doubles up as a cute bag charm join us as we guide you through the entire process of making a cat cardholder from start to finish with our easy-to-follow instructions you ll have your own cat cardholder pouch in no time whether you re a seasoned crocheter or just starting out you ll find this adorable cardholder tutorial project both enjoyable and rewarding you will need * yarn - any color you like for the cat a small amount of yarn in a contrasting color for the fish and a small amount of dark brown or black for the eyes * crochet hook * yarn needle * stitch marker i used weight 4 yarn and a 3mm hook if you want your cat cardholder to be the same size as mine use any yarn that can fit well on a 3mm/no 5 hook in this tutorial you ll learn * how to crochet a cat cardholder * step-by-step crochet instructions with detailed visuals * some tips to help you enjoy your crochet experience more ✨ why you ll love this tutorial * full crochet cat cardholder with lanyard free * clear easy-to-follow instructions * high-quality close-up visuals to guide you through each step * a fun and rewarding project that would make a great gift 1 https //youtu be/72fiesdcyay 2 https //crochetmusings net/products/cat-pouch-with-lanyard-pattern-pdf-download
